name: Nickle
description:
Nickle V1

Controls:  Use the Left Mouse Button and click on the terrain to move.  The Right Mouse Button will pickup and drop items.  Pressing the Right Mouse Button while on water will set the site of your dam and lodge.

Objectives:  Build a dam, build a lodge and fill the lodge with Shrubs and Bark to attract a mate and procreate some kits.

DevNote:

Had a lot of fun putting this prototype together.  Still some kinks to be ironed out. Many of the sound FX are from Freesound.org and contributors are credited in-game  Enjoy!

                                                                        - GPVFX_SB
